message: I'm feeling generous, but let's be realistic. This offer won't be as good next round!
I'll take a bit less, but don't wait for better!
This is a fair deal, Alice. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our profits.
Inflation is biting, let's end this!
Okay Alice, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.
